title: How am I going to die? - Quora

response.answer_text: There’s no really no way to tell if you are going to die. People can just die out of the blue, of old age, of diseases, etc. Even though you can't tell, there are predictions. Here are some factors that could attribute to your death. 1# Do you smoke? 2# Do you drink? 3# Do you do drugs? Those are three basic questions, though if you do one of those three things that puts you at a greater risk of dying from these things. Even though those are huge factors there's other factors. For example… Do you have diabetes? Do you own a vehicle? Do you do dangerous things? To be specific if your diabetic that puts at a risk of dying from diabetes, if you own a vehicle that means your at a greater risk of a vehicle accident, and if your a daredevil that puts you at a greater risk of dying from daredevil things. So really there's no way to tell, but there are factors that could predict your death.

UNDOUBTEDLY AND  UNWILLINGLY More individuals than not will not die voluntarily. That does not mean they consciously struggle to resist dying and accepting death. I’m just saying that whether it is consciously or sub-consciously the mind and body will keep trying to avoid ceasing to function and ceasing to exist for as long as possible if given the time, energy, and opportunity. As for what is going to cause YOU to die, besides imperfection, I am not a psychic BUT, even if I knew how you will die, I would not tell you. Up until you actually die, how it will happen can change. So my suggestion would be ——- DON’T LOOK FOR THAT ANSWER.

You’re going to die, I am going to die, everyone is going to die, everything is going die. But you don’t know how and when you’re going to die, so you don’t need to overthinking about it. But you still need to be careful. And here’s a picture of a monkey dancing:  I love monkeys, not really.

Heart Failure. let me explain: nobody does of a stab wound, or blunt force trauma, gunshot wound, etc. those things cause trauma/blood loss, that causes your heart to stop. Without a beating heart, you die. Everything causes heart failure, hence, you will die of Heart Failure
Send me a picture of your palm and I can tell you. Actually you can do it yourself. On your palm look for the line that is directly (Fucking horse shit). Just wasted your time, sorry.

Due to a cardiac arrest. U doubt that? Haha let u check it after u die. Oh no u wouldn't be there to check on it right?..So it doesn't matter how u die,but what matter is that ' how u live today and that too with no regrets' Do what ever u do to make u happy ,but don't think about your last breathe.

Well thats an open ended question, did you know there is a TV show actually called “a thousand ways to die” we had a sicko that we forced him to watch it and asked him if he picked one method yet, last I heard he was still trying to make a decision on it.

death comes in a way like a thief,it dont tell u i kill u in this day,but it kills u whenever your time over in this body,it kills u without mercy,or it dont see u you are are a rich or poor,the death comes to u because to create another situation of people comes to see ur dead body in news,or at your place,or it becomesfor some people entertainment story,or it is a one life lesson for all people have to learnt that you will die one day to leave this body,so work,earn and live happy
Unfortunately no one can answer this question. Even if someone is dying from a terminal illness, there's still a chance that something else could take their life.
